db.juhaku.juhakudb.filter

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.filter.Expression

  • public class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by juha on 04/05/17.

    Expression stands for function e.g. lower(value) or value for SQL queries. This expression can be used in predicates and in predicate builder for creating advanced queries against database.

    Since:
    2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static Expression of(java.lang.Object value)
        Create expression of value. Used for wrapping given value as an expression for predicate builder for creating criteria for SQL query.
        Parameters:
        value - Object value to be converted to expression.
        Returns:
        Expression of provided argument.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

      • ofCollection

        public static Expression[] ofCollection(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> values)
        Create expression array of provided collection of values. Used to wrap up object collection to expressions for predicate builder to create SQL query.
        Parameters:
        values - Collection of objects to be converted to array of expressions.
        Returns:
        Array of expressions containing values of provided objects.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

      • min

        public static Expression min(java.lang.Object arg)
        Creates MIN(arg) function expression. Min expression is used to get smallest value.
        Parameters:
        arg - Object arg to convert to expression.
        Returns:
        Expression for min function.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

      • min

        public static Expression min(java.lang.Object... args)
        Creates multi MIN(arg, arg, arg, ...) function expression. Multi min expression works similar to normal min expression but it selects smallest value from provided array instead of column of database.
        Parameters:
        args - Object argument array to convert to multi min expression.
        Returns:
        Expression for min function.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

      • abs

        public static Expression abs(java.lang.Object arg)
        Creates ABS(arg) function expression. Abs expression will convert argument's absolute value. E.g. for -1 it would be 1.
        Parameters:
        arg - Object arg to convert to expression.
        Returns:
        Expression for abs function.

      • trim

        public static Expression trim(java.lang.Object arg)
        Creates TRIM(arg) function expression. Trim function will trim whitespace from both ends of given argument.
        Parameters:
        arg - Object arg to convert to expression.
        Returns:
        Expression for trim function.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT

      • trim

        public static Expression trim(java.lang.Object arg,
                              java.lang.String letter)
        Creates TRIM(arg, letter) function expression. Trim with letter will trim all occurrences of given letter from both ends of argument. E.g. for function TRIM('aaaMessageaaa', 'a') output would become: Message.
        Parameters:
        arg - Object arg to convert to expression.
        Returns:
        Expression for trim function.
        Since:
        2.0.2-SNAPSHOT
